function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of emphasis on air quality and ventilation in residential environments","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and compromised respiratory health","Mitigation":"Implementing proper ventilation systems and air purification technology","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with high-efficiency filters","People":"Residents, building occupants","Owner":"Architects, building owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate presence of outdoor and safe indoor spaces for socialization","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health and well-being of residents","Mitigation":"Designing and creating outdoor communal areas and safe indoor spaces for socialization","Technologies":"Smart landscaping, use of biophilic design principles","People":"Residents, community planners, architects","Owner":"Local authorities, developers"},{"Description":"Infrequent cleaning and lack of contactless technologies in residential spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of surface transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing self-cleaning surfaces and touchless technologies in residential spaces","Technologies":"Antimicrobial surfaces, touchless faucets and light switches","People":"Residents, building occupants","Owner":"Building managers, technology providers"}]}
